document_data.name: Hinnia Fernshadow
document_data.mainbody: '''Hinnia Fernshadow''' was a member of the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: She had long brown hair and pale eyes. She wore a [[chain shirt]] and carried an elaborate [[staff]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Hinnia joined the Elves of Cormanthor to help reclaim [[Myth Drannor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|camp]] near the city. She spent her time coordinating different efforts in the ruins, largely focused on rescuing the lost [[Eilistraee's Wanderers]] and counter-attacking the [[Red Wizards]] of [[Droic Orgul]].
